name: Com-Plex Season Of Fire.
description:
An Indie game that is supposed to entertain players! The game has 10 levels and one final level. In the next Update there will be new levels and qualities of the player depending on the expectations of the players.

[player characteristics ]
1.Shield aura for defence!
2.Health bar
3.Life system(3 lifes) [levels characteristics]
1.Time(When the time is up the player loses a life)
2.Enemies
3.3 keys( each opens the necessary doors to complete the level)
4.Internet connection required
